SELECT AudioFile.companyId, AudioFile.groupId, AudioFile.userId, AudioFile.userName, AudioFile.createDate, AudioFile.modifyDate,
AudioFile.viewCounter, AudioFile.audioId, AudioFile.audioName, AudioFile.audioInfo, AudioFile.audioType, AudioFile.audioFileId
FROM AudioPlayer_AudioFile AudioFile
WHERE (AudioFile.audioName LIKE ?) AND (AudioFile.groupId = ?)
ORDER BY AudioFile.createDate DESC
